short_summary: A reverse osmosis filtration system was acquired by purchasing the equipment, commissioning, and installation included for delivery located in Saint-Hyacinthe, Province of Quebec, Canada
description: One (as detailed in Annex A, the details of the bid are attached), reverse osmosis filtration system consisting of equipment and commissioning, to be installed and delivered to Saint-Hyacinthe, Quebec, Canada.
full_summary:
# Reverse Osmosis Filtration System
RFP 01B46-230560

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) acting on behalf of Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada invites bids for the acquisition, delivery, and commissioning of a reverse osmosis filtration system.

## Important Dates and Details
* Response Deadline: April 25, 2023, at 2:00 PM EDT
* Contract Expected Start Date: N/A
* Contract Expected End Date: December 31, 2023
* Notice Type: Request for Proposal (RFP)
* Procurement Method: Competitive Open Bidding
* Trade Agreement: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

## Call for Bids
This RFP aims to acquire a reverse osmosis filtration system, including delivery, installation, and commissioning. The system must be situated in Saint-Hyacinthe, Quebec, Canada.

## Tender Requirements
* The bid submission and required supporting documentation must be received by April 25, 2023, by 2:00 PM EDT.
* Late bids will not be considered.
* For detailed information on the requirements, please refer to Annex A in the RFP documentation.

## Procurement Details
* Procurement Category: Goods and Services (GD)
* UNSPSC Code: 41104900 - Laboratory filtering equipment and supplies
* Trade Agreements: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Regions of Delivery: Saint-Hyacinthe, Quebec, Canada

## Contact Information
If you have any inquiries, please contact the Bidder Support Team at the following details:
* Name: Annie Blanchet (she/her)
* Email: [annie.blanchet@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:annie.blanchet@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
* Phone (not available)
* Fax (not available)
* Address (not available)

This RFP reference number is 01B46-230560. You can access the official documentation at [http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/15915554?extsite=MTU5MTU1NTRfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/15915554?extsite=MTU5MTU1NTRfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==).

Please direct any questions to the contact mentioned above. Note
